com.capgemini.cobigen.api

Interface ConfigurationInterpreter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CobiGen

    public interface ConfigurationInterpreter
    The configuration interpreter is responsible to interpret the underlying CobiGen configuration and e.g. retrieve templates and increment for a specific input.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<IncrementTo> getMatchingIncrements(Object matcherInput)
      Returns all matching increments for a given input object
      List<TemplateTo> getMatchingTemplates(Object matcherInput)
      Returns the List of matching templates for the given input object
      List<String> getMatchingTriggerIds(Object matcherInput)
      Returns all matching trigger ids for a given input object
      Path resolveTemplateDestinationPath(Path targetRootPath, TemplateTo template, Object input)
      Resolves the destination path of a template for a given root path to generate to as well as a given input to be used for variable resolution.

    • Method Detail

      • getMatchingTriggerIds

        List<String> getMatchingTriggerIds(Object matcherInput)
        Returns all matching trigger ids for a given input object
        Parameters:
        matcherInput - object
        Returns:
        the List of matching trigger ids

      • getMatchingIncrements

        List<IncrementTo> getMatchingIncrements(Object matcherInput)
                                 throws InvalidConfigurationException
        Returns all matching increments for a given input object
        Parameters:
        matcherInput - object
        Returns:
        this List of matching increments
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigurationException - if the configuration of CobiGen is not valid

      • getMatchingTemplates

        List<TemplateTo> getMatchingTemplates(Object matcherInput)
                               throws InvalidConfigurationException
        Returns the List of matching templates for the given input object
        Parameters:
        matcherInput - input object activates a matcher and thus is target for context variable extraction. Possibly a combined or wrapping object for multiple input objects
        Returns:
        the List of matching templates
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigurationException - if the configuration is not valid

      • resolveTemplateDestinationPath

        Path resolveTemplateDestinationPath(Path targetRootPath,
                                    TemplateTo template,
                                    Object input)
        Resolves the destination path of a template for a given root path to generate to as well as a given input to be used for variable resolution.
        Parameters:
        targetRootPath - root path to generate to
        template - TemplateTo to resolve the path for
        input - the generator input to be used.
        Returns:
        the full Path of the targeted file by the template
